name: Renegades Deluxe
description:
Released in 2014

Alien Breed inspired 2-player split-screen deathmatch fun!

Choose from one of 6 battle-hardened mercenairies to do battle in one of 20 arenas in a fight to the death!

Old-school Amiga action in the Amiga .ADF file format for use with Emulators!

Featuring:
- Fake walls
- Jammed doors
- Power pickups
